review: I had consulted the doctor and it was for abdomen pain. Doctor was good in consulting me. The concern was consultation fee was high, It was Rs 1500. Hardly it was 5 minutes consultation. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. I had online consultation.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for chest pain. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I can surely recommend doctor to others. Medical tests were done. There was waiting time in the hospital when we went. It was for 1 hour. Diet was suggested. Hospitality was good.

I had heart related issue so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** ******* * am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went. I am good now. I am continuing medicines still. Doctor spoke well. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Nilesh Gautam is one of the eminent dr in cardiac area.
He explains patients problem in exact words and his way of treatment is very exact to subside the medical problems.
I am taking his treatment for cholesterol and thyroid for last three years.ans I am satisfied with the results which is out come of his treatment. I suggest his name for anyone who has any kind of cardiac problem.

I meet Dr. Nilesh gautam at Asian heart hospital mumbai for my mother angioplasty. He is jewel & charming in his field. He explain each & everything before surgery & even after surgery he daily comes to take update abt recovery. i really appreciate him. Thank you Dr. Gautam once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: happy to discuss my problems and had satisfaction. would be also suggests about Dr. would also take Dr appointment when required next.
